resources.string: SAM: Cycles through white, magenta, blue and green colors (emulates the Pentair SAM color changing light)
Caribbean: Transitions between a variety of blues and greens
Romance: Slow color transitions creating a mesmerizing and calming effect
California Sunset: Dramatic transitions of orange, red and magenta tones
American: Patriotic red, white and blue transition
Party: Rapid color changing building energy and excitement
Recall: Activate the last saved color effect
Hold: Save the current color effect during a color light show
